ygData.subject: Re: Dual Wield curiosity question
ygData.msgSnippet: The screaming mace is a good one hand blunt weapon on par with a mino axe for damage/delay.  I don t recall the magical effect it sets off, but I know it is a
ygData.messageBody:
The screaming mace is a good one hand blunt weapon on par with a mino axe
for damage/delay. I don't recall the magical effect it sets off, but I know
it is a good dual combo with my PGT.

I am pretty sure the screamer is a lore item, so you can only hold one. I
can't think of any other good 1 handed blunt weapons for a warrior off hand
that are magical damage.

Bael
Tier'dal Warrior

-----Original Message-----
From: Trent Carroll <trent@...>

Date: Monday, July 19, 1999 9:09 AM
Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] Dual Wield curiosity question


>From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>
>
>It is possible, but only acceptable for RP purposes. There are not many
>decent special 1H blunts that have been found. The ones that have are
>limited to clerics and casters and such. I understand why you would want
an
>ogre warrioress to use blunt and go "Ugh, you go squish!!" instead for
>swish, swish, swish. There are also some 1h Axe's which might look good
>with you character, so you might not want to rule out 1h slash all
together.
>
>Trent Carroll
> Programmer
> Houston Baptist University
> (281) 649-3410

>>

>> Ogre Warrioress

>> thing, its really annoying her.
